citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 445pm on
03-MAR-17.
Contact with licensee was made by phone and optimal hours for inspection were discussed.

narrative:
